title: Spanish Comprehensible Input | Christmas and Winter Words

media:group.media:title: Spanish Comprehensible Input | Christmas and Winter Words
media:group.media:description:
This video uses CI (comprehensible input) to teach you #35 common Spanish words and expressions to be able to start talking about Christmas and the winter season today! 

Through storytelling, as well as "storyasking," you will have moments to practice speaking Spanish and responding to questions in the target language as we collaborate in a winter wonderland! 

TPRS (Teaching Proficiency through Reading and Storytelling) has been proven to be an effective and engaging way to learn a new language. If you enjoy this approach to language acquisition, let me know by subscribing to my channel for more TPRS and CI videos to come!
